name: https://geo.driihm.fr/geonetwork
description: GeoNetwork Data Catalog for Spatial Data Infrastructures. Provides metadata editing and search functions for geospatial data, including layers, services, and maps. Supports ISO19115/119/110 and Dublin Core standards. Allows users to search, publish, and manage spatial resources, including OGC services (WMS, WMTS, KML).
